Two sides filled with superstars, match-winners and all-round fun people. Two captains who have inspired their national teams with their performances and leadership. Apart from class batters and bowlers, two sides who have set the benchmark for fielding too. And two teams that, during the league phase, won once against each other.The first Womenâ€™s Premier League final is fitting for more reasons than just the primary one of featuring the top two teams of the league phase. There is a case to be made that MIâ€™s best result of the league stage came against DC, and in the same way, DCâ€™s most impressive performance was against MI.
